levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Ottiene (Rison. più alta.) [Breath] (max 4)
- A 15+ [Breath], ottiene invece Potere Finale +(Rison. più alta) (max 4)
[BeforeAttack] Ottiene (Rison. più alta / 2) Conteggio [Breath] (max 2)
- A 5+ Conteggio [Breath], ottiene invece Potere Moneta +(Rison. più alta / 2) (max 2)
[TargetKill] Ottiene 1 [HoldingBreath] il turno successivo (2 volte per turno)

-  A 5+ Conteggio [Breath], ottiene invece Potere Moneta +(Rison. più alta / 2) (max 2)
[TargetKill] Ottiene <style="highlight">2</style> [HoldingBreath] il turno successivo (<style="highlight">4</style> volte per turno)

coindescs.desc: Infligge +(Potenza + Conteggio [Breath])% danni su Colpo Critico (max <style="highlight">40%</style>)

levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Da' priorità ai bersagli con i PV minori (priorità agli alleati)
Se il bersaglio di quest'Abilità è un alleato, infligge +30% danni

[BeforeAttack] A meno di 15 [Breath], consuma 10% PV per ottenere [Breath] e +5 Conteggio [Breath]
- Non può Vacillare o morire tramite quest'effetto

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 2 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count

levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
<style="highlight">- Gain 1 [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max 2)</style>

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain <style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover half of SP used by this Skill</style>

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)</style>

levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
- Gain <style="highlight">2</style> [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max <style="highlight">4</style>)

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 3 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 4 [Breath] and +<style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover SP used by this Skill and regain 1 of each E.G.O resources consumed</style>

coindescs.desc: Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max <style="highlight">40%</style>)
